assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Inotersen_Initial_Initiation_Criteria_Q3
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Is the patient symptomatic and meets one of following characteristics of early-stage neuropathy?
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Yes, patient is symptomatic with early-stage neuropathy, defined as: No, patient is not symptomatic and/or does not meet definition of early-stage neuropathy
